The friction force (f) on each log is equal to the normal force, f = N = -0.5mg.

premise: The maximum static friction is equal to the sliding friction.
conclusion: Set f_static = f to find the relationship between μs and μk.

premise: f_static = f, so μs × N = μk × N.
